title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: September 30, 2022, 03:12:16 PMLast edit: January 24, 2023, 05:39:58 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Have to clear out the room where these reside due to additional grandchildren coming to live with me - miners work great, I just have no where to put them.4 1 - Terminus R606’s1 - Goldshell HS1+1 - Goldshell LBY box miner1 - Futurebit Apollo LTC miner (batch 2) running full node software SOLDNo psu included. $250 ea  $200 ea miner - free shipping included within the US - international, will have to calculate

comments.author: philipma1957

comments.author: jwinterm
comments.body: You selling all four 606s for $200, or each one for $200? Assuming the latter but not entirely clear.
